page.title: 17A day in my life(Civilian).3
page.content: I was walking up the yard & my mum had just arrived from work so I went to say Hello. After that I had a game of football with my brother Gary. After we'd scored 5 goals each I went down to see Flash, my calf, & I put his halter on him & took him for a walk because it was very sunny. After I had taken Flash for his walk my mum was calling me to come in for tea, we had fish & chips. I was asking my dad if I could keep some of the piglets. The time now was 8.30pm. I went out again & walked down the yard. On the way I went to see my sister's pony called Fudge, then I helped my dad load up the tractor. After that I went down to see 53 again. It was 9.30pm so I ran up the yard, went inside & went to bed after a very exciting day. (C.RICHARDSON).
